text:
@Alyssa_Milano @realDonaldTrump Thanks for sharing the truth! He said “Democrats are POLITICIZING the coronavirus” and when he says “it is their new hoax” that is what he is referring to.

You forgot to remove the first half of the video like @JoeBiden so people think that he is calling the coronavirus a hoax.
